Title 18, United States Code, is amended to include a new chapter on transportation of minors in circumvention of certain laws relating to abortion. The "Child Interstate Abortion Notification Act" introduces regulations on transporting minors across state lines for abortions, aiming to prevent the circumvention of parental involvement laws.
